data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/9CWYdLi7iVizoOXYE57jyPfb4HR.jpg","id":4551,"title":"Be Cool","original_title":"Be Cool","overview":"Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive along the way.","poster_path":"/ekKCH7Zkb5ZTr1f1AczZY23FH.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,80],"popularity":20.986,"release_date":"2005-03-04","video":false,"vote_average":5.5,"vote_count":848},{"backdrop_path":"/g3TFClgl6eVSTl8IRMg5m9qNX2U.jpg","id":333676,"title":"Alex \u0026 the List","original_title":"Alex \u0026 the List","overview":"Alex, a lovable, unassuming dog trainer is in love with a great woman - Katherine - smart, talented, from a good family. Katherine adores Alex's quirky sense of humor, honesty and capacity to listen. Having decided to pop the question, Alex is blindsided when Katherine produces a detailed list of well-thought-out \"improvements\" she feels will tweak Alex on their way to becoming the ideal couple. Alex instinctively rejects the suggestion that he needs to change anything. But with the threat of a new competitor, Alex decides to \"do the list.\" Guided by a coterie of friends that include: Dave, Alex's loyal childhood buddy, best female friend Lily, her husband Michael, and their 8 year old son, Nicky, Alex's journey has him reconsider and question his beliefs, values and world.","poster_path":"/bvQvLPMtOuj4slgOCZTUrS0Gyjl.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[10749,35],"popularity":6.809,"release_date":"2018-05-04","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":43},{"backdrop_path":"/n3UWHyZU5g9Rf7DA0m4UUNSAemd.jpg","id":22575,"title":"Go West","original_title":"Go West","overview":"Embezzler, shill, all around confidence man S. Quentin Quale is heading west to find his fortune; he meets the crafty but simple brothers Joseph and Rusty Panello in a train station, where they steal all his money. They're heading west, too, because they've heard you can just pick the gold off the ground. Once there, they befriend an old miner named Dan Wilson whose property, Dead Man's Gulch, has no gold. They loan him their last ten dollars so he can go start life anew, and for collateral, he gives them the deed to the Gulch. Unbeknownst to Wilson, the son of his longtime rival, Terry Turner (who's also in love with his daughter, Eva), has contacted the railroad to arrange for them to build through the land, making the old man rich and hopefully resolving the feud. But the evil Red Baxter, owner of a saloon, tricks the boys out of the deed, and it's up to them - as well as Quale, who naturally finds his way out west anyway - to save the day.","poster_path":"/di0laTicoduEdp1WS10T8Poss7r.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,37],"popularity":13.629,"release_date":"1940-12-06","video":false,"vote_average":6.481,"vote_count":81},{"backdrop_path":"/5OVo7ZiBgLCfnOh56EfKbHXtzEm.jpg","id":86666,"title":"Gate of Flesh","original_title":"肉体の門","overview":"In the shady black markets and bombed-out hovels of post–World War II Tokyo, a tough band of prostitutes eke out a dog-eat-dog existence, maintaining tenuous friendships and a semblance of order in a world of chaos. But when a renegade ex-soldier stumbles into their midst, lusts and loyalties clash, with tragic results. With Gate of Flesh, visionary director Seijun Suzuki delivers a whirlwind of social critique and pulp drama, shot through with brilliant colors and raw emotions.","poster_path":"/yRi34m5PlktF5NdgHEKOzyOkHGo.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":13.794,"release_date":"1964-05-31","video":false,"vote_average":6.6,"vote_count":57},{"backdrop_path":"/e4fqLZTVQHppCH7nij46OJtcAVo.jpg","id":32052,"title":"Go Tell the Spartans","original_title":"Go Tell the Spartans","overview":"Go Tell the Spartans is a 1978 American war film based on Daniel Ford's 1967 novel \"Incident at Muc Wa.\" It tells the story about U.S. Army military advisers during the early part of the Vietnam War.
